channel.title: Server issue
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Thanks to everyone for previous help. I have always had this problem, When more than 29-33 people sign on, the server I guess overloads and in the Runserver.bat it says ""playername" is already online" to everyone who was playing. I don't know if it's the bandwith or what. My MaxConnections is set to 150.. Any help would be greatly appreciated.
Thanks,
eclipse245[br][size=1]Posted on: August 20, 2007, 04:22:09 PM[/size][hr]any help??

item.title: Server issue
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

I guess, but any sources that dont have this problem??[br][size=1]Posted on: August 21, 2007, 10:27:26 AM[/size][hr]will fr33sc4p3 work?

Read full topic
